post.body: ya'll are crackin' me up! and by the way - technically, MD is a Southern state - at the top of the mason/dixon line....
nite,Wendy!
heheee
i like plenty of tabasco on my fish!!
lawd have mercy.
don't put any ideas in my head :)
it's all good!!
but why do they (this includes T.O.) have to wear the bling earrings on the FIELD??
see...that sounds like a plan!!
you are too funny!!! if i start cookin' on the side of the road - ima try to make me some $$$$ - sell some fish and cornbread!
and I'm lovin' the Chargers...I want Peyton to go downnnnnnnnnnnnnn....
you are gunnin' for that meal, aren't you? :)
oh no - that has to be Platinum Weddings, I've never had anything like that ever happen on my show!!! I'd be crackin' up..
i just looked at LT - that boy got some pretty eyes!! i have a thing for a great set of...eyes :)
yeah, girl - we play straight up ghetto football. the kind where you will get you a*** kicked! We play HARD! Poor Miami!!
i'm just sayin' - his coif/beard looked mighty "groomed" :)
on another tip - is the Jerome Bettis coloring his beard/hair? that stuff looks like an ad for "Just For Men"!!!!
i know. you do know that bmore plays what we call 'hood football?
nah - he's saving himself for the 4th quarter....your boy Peyton is feelin' a wee bit pressure - hmm???
alright.....gonna finish watching the Chargers/Colts game. But tomorrow - I'm goin' to Miami :) GO RAVENS!!!
